NAME: C_RATING
LABEL: Campus 2013 Rating: M=Met Standard, A=Met Alternative Standard, I=Improvement Required, X/Z=Not Rated, Q=Not Rated due to Data Integrity issue

NAME: C_UPDATE
LABEL: Campus 2013 Final Rating Update Status: 0 = Appeal not granted, 1 = Appeal granted to ‘M’ - Met Standard, 2 = Appeal granted to ‘A’ - AEA Met Standard, 3 = Appeal granted to ‘X’ - Not Rated, 4 = Rating Update to ‘Q’ - Not Rated due to Data Integrity issue, 5 = Rating updated to ‘I’ - Improvement Required based on Data Integrity issue

NAME: GRDTYPE
LABEL: School Type: E-Elementary, M-Middle, S-Senior, B-Both

NAME: CFLAEATYPE
LABEL: Campus 2013 Flag - AEC of Choice and/or Residential Treatment Facility under AEA Procedures

NAME: CFLAEC
LABEL: Campus 2013 Flag - AEC of Choice under AEA Procedures (Y/N)

NAME: CFLPAIRD
LABEL: Campus 2013 Flag - Campus Paired with Their District (Y/N)

NAME: CFLEEK
LABEL: Campus 2013 Flag - High Grade of PK/K (Y/N)

NAME: CFLNEWCAMP
LABEL: Campus 2013 Flag - New School (Compared to Last Year Fall Enrollment) (Y/N)

NAME: CFLALTED
LABEL: Campus 2013 Flag - Rated under AEA Procedures (Y/N)

NAME: CFLRTF
LABEL: Campus 2013 Flag - Residential Treatment Facility under AEA Procedures (Y/N)

NAME: CI1_MET
LABEL: Campus 2013 Index 1: Met Index (Y=Yes, N=No, P=Paired, X/Z=Not Rated)

NAME: CI2_MET
LABEL: Campus 2013: Index 2 Met Index (Y=Yes, N=No, P=Paired, X/Z=Not Rated)

NAME: CI3_MET
LABEL: Campus 2013 Index 3 Met Index (Y=Yes, N=No, P=Paired, X/Z=Not Rated)

NAME: CI4_MET
LABEL: Campus 2013 Index 4: Met Index (Y=Yes, N=No, P=Paired, X/Z=Not Rated)
